category: Best Motion Picture of the Year
Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role
Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role

nominations.notes: At age 85 years and 321 days, Riva is (to date) the oldest ever nominee for the Academy Award for Best Actress. She earned this honor in the same year as the award's youngest ever nominee, Quvenzhané Wallis.

At age 9 years and 135 days, Wallis is (to date) the youngest ever nominee for the Academy Award for Best Actress. She earned this honor in the same year as the award's oldest ever nominee, Emmanuelle Riva.

category: Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Achievement in Makeup and Hairstyling
Best Achievement in Music Written for Motion Pictures, Original Song

nominations.notes: For the song "Everybody Needs A Best Friend".

category: Best Achievement in Music Written for Motion Pictures, Original Score

nominations.notes: Tied with Paul N.J. Ottosson for Zero Dark Thirty (2012).
Tied with Per Hallberg and Karen Baker Landers for Skyfall (2012).

category: Best Foreign Language Film of the Year

nominations.notes: Brenda Chapman became the first woman to win an Academy Award for Best Animated Feature Film of the Year.
